email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear David Wilson,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 25,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m.

Our starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per metric ton. The laycan for this shipment is from 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

Please let us know if you have any questions or require further details. We look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Laura Harris
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider a reduction to USD 24.00 per metric ton? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the vessel's draft?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
David Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we are willing to adjust the freight rate to USD 24.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, and the vessel's draft is 14.5m.

Please let us know if this revised rate is acceptable so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Laura Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The revised rate of USD 24.50 per metric ton is acceptable. Could you confirm the laycan remains as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25? Also, please provide the details for the cargo insurance under CIF terms.

Best regards,
David Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Thank you for your confirmation. The laycan remains as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. Under CIF terms, we will arrange for cargo insurance covering all risks, and we will provide you with the insurance certificate once the shipment is finalized.

Please let us know if there are any further details you require.

Best regards,
Laura Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Everything looks good on our end. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please send over the final contract for review and signature.

Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Best regards,
David Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Contract for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Attached is the final contract for the coal shipment. Please review and sign at your earliest convenience. Once signed, we will proceed with the necessary arrangements to secure the vessel for your shipment.

Looking forward to a successful operation.

Best regards,
Laura Harris
